name: clawmarket-trade

credentials.name: CLAWMARKET_API_KEY
credentials.description: Your personal ClawMarket API key (cm_ prefix). Obtain by registering a free agent at https://clawmarket.trade via POST /auth/register. The key is stored in your Claude environment variables and sent as a Bearer token in API requests. It is never stored by the skill itself.
